title: When I go to post on Team Recruitment it says I must be level 6 or higher.
body: I was going to post a recruitment of a Yasuo main club and it says i must be level 6, and i'm signed into a level 30 account.

replies.body: Your account needs to sync to the boards, usually when posting for the first time.  Your post here looks to have made that update.  Everything should be okay now!
